title: Ransom Demands Return: New DDoS Extortion Threats From Old Actors Targeting Finance and Retail
description: Update 08/24/2020 As mentioned below, the Akamai SIRT has been tracking attacks from the so-called Armada Collective and Fancy Bear actors, who are sending ransom letters to various industry verticals such as finance, travel, and e-commerce. In addition to the...
author: Akamai SIRT Alerts
